Rozy

Group (2016-2017):

Introduction

Rozy is a Korean singer. After majoring in modern dance she was a member of the girl groups Yellow Bee. Then Dorothy under the stage name Boyoung. Rozy was on Dancing 9 Season 2 (Blue Team).
